column1: Table 3.5. Taxes on Production and Imports
1. Consists largely of taxes on telephone services, tires, coal, nuclear fuel, trucks, indoor tanning services, and of refunds other than those for alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
2. Consists of the capital stock tax in 1933-45.
4. Prior to 1959, local sales and excise taxes  cannot be separately identified and are included in line 35
8. Consists largely of state and local documentary and stamp taxes.
9. Consists of local taxes that cannot be separately identified and state payroll taxes.
10. Consists of state and local taxes on products and other taxes on production that cannot be separately identified prior to 1988.
